situation.title: Outside seating, terraces, indoor gardens
situation.meta_description: Rules for operation of outside seating, terraces and indoor gardens durring the pandemic time.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Outside seating, terraces, indoor gardens in restaurant facilities can stay open. The same rules as for the restaurants have to be followed.

All restaurants, pubs, etc. have to strictly follow all hygienic rules and measures. All guests must be seated with a maximum capacity filled to 50% of the establishment. One table can be occupied by a maximum of 4 persons.

Guests inside the establishment have to wear a face mask or respirator during their stay, with the exception of the time of consumption. Guests who did not enter together as a group have to respect a 2-meter distance from each other. 

Takeout windows can stay open longer but obey the night peace regime.
